moves.1. e4 e5 2. c3 Nc6 3. d4 Nf6: Black looks to get his pieces out quickly.
moves.6. Bg3 exd4 7. e5: Sacrificing three Pawns for a Black Knight.
moves.7... dxc3 8. exf6: It appears that 8...PxP will win White's QR. But White thinks he has a refutation.
moves.8... cxb2: Black goes ahead with his plan.
moves.9. Qe2+: White's secret weapon. Now he can play 10 QxP and save his QR -- he thinks.
moves.9... Qe7: Brilliant! Now White's Queen is pinned ant cannot capture the Pawn.
moves.10. fxe7: Practically forced, as he must break the pin.
moves.11... Bxb2: White's QR is still trapped. Rusakov resigns.
